name: Guerilla Gorilla Girlilla
description:
What if a solo Guerilla Girl were to protect a pack of entrapped gorillas from the unhealthy snacks of tourist terrorist zoo patrons???   "Eat shit and die!" is the anthem of this single player dodgeball food fight fecal fruition of the Butterscotch Shenanijam!

Mouse and Keyboard: Use arrows or WASD to move.  Use Mouse to aim and click to throw shit at the patrons.

Controller: Joysticks move and aim.  Press 'a' to toss some feces at those jerks.

Art by Eli Balbach

Audio and code by Max Moon
